data.title: Bus or train to Khust, schedules and tickets
data.meta_description: Bus or train to and from Khust - info on departures, bus and train stations. See over 48 lines going to Khust and book cheap tickets online.
data.text:
Bus stations and stops

We have located 2 bus stops in Khust.

Some of the most popular companies departing from Khust are: Stecik, Sindbad, Nikolo and DMD Group.

Note: Buses to and from Khust ONLY STOP at the bus stops specified on your ticket.

The stops and stations listed below are those most commonly used as departure locations by the intercity buses operating from Khust:
